snapshot_image_id.description: The identifier of the snapshot image used to create the new snapshot volume. Note: You'll likely want to use the M(netapp_e_facts) module to find the ID of the image you want.

state.description: Whether to create or remove the snapshot volume

api_password.description: The password to authenticate with the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.

repo_percentage.description: The size of the view in relation to the size of the base volume

full_threshold.description: The repository utilization warning threshold percentage

name.description: The name you wish to give the snapshot volume

storage_pool_name.description: Name of the storage pool on which to allocate the repository volume.

api_username.description: The username to authenticate with the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.

api_url.description: The url to the SANtricity WebServices Proxy or embedded REST API.
